short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the "accept cookies?" popup when you visit a website. Because of course, you always accept...
short.fr: Cette extention cache les popups "accepter les cookies?" lorsque vous visitez un site. Parce que évidemment, vous les acceptez…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides the "accept cookies?" popup when you visit a website. Because of course, you always accept...
Keep in mind that this app does not accept cookies for you. It just hides sh*t tones of css rules.

Github: https://github.com/Manoz/Cookies-F-cker
long.fr:
This extension hide the "accept cookies?" popup when you visit a website. Cause of course, you always accept.

Github: https://github.com/Manoz/Cookies-F-cker
